body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our company. My name is Mark Rivera and I am a customer service agent at XYZ Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Barbara Evans.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Barbara. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently purchased a car from your dealership and I'm quite surprised by the product quality.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. To better assist you, could you please provide me with the VIN number of the car you purchased?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the VIN number is seven seven nine zero two one six three eight five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Barbara. One more question, what is the current mileage of the car?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The mileage is five five zero zero five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Barbara. I will investigate the product quality issue further. We appreciate your feedback and will strive to address your concerns.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time and for contacting us about this matter. Have a great day, Barbara.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Mark. I appreciate your assistance. Goodbye.
